title: Update query.Ready to exclude awaiting ticks
description:
Modify query.Ready() in internal/query/ready.go to exclude ticks with awaiting set

Current behavior:
- Returns open/in_progress ticks not blocked by open blockers
- Respects defer_until dates
- Excludes Manual=true (via separate --include-manual flag in CLI)

New behavior:
- Also exclude ticks where Awaiting != null
- Use tick.IsAwaitingHuman() helper for backwards compat with Manual

This is critical for ticker integration:
- tk next uses Ready() to find agent-workable tasks
- Tasks awaiting human response should NOT be returned
- Agent should move on to other tasks while waiting for human

Implementation:
In the Ready() filter loop, add check:
  if t.IsAwaitingHuman() {
      continue // Skip, waiting for human
  }

Note: The Manual field handling may already be in CLI layer (--include-manual). Need to consolidate with awaiting handling.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Ready() excludes ticks with Awaiting set
- [ ] Ready() excludes ticks with Manual=true (unchanged)
- [ ] Uses IsAwaitingHuman() helper for consistency
- [ ] tk next no longer returns awaiting ticks
- [ ] Backwards compat with existing Manual handling
